scripts.install-cdk-express-pipeline-npm: npm uninstall cdk-express-pipeline && npm install cdk-express-pipeline
scripts.package-src: cd /Users/rehanvandermerwe/Rehan/Projects/cdk-express-pipeline && npm run compile && npm run package:js
scripts.install-cdk-express-pipeline-locally: npm uninstall cdk-express-pipeline && npm run package-src && npm install /Users/rehanvandermerwe/Rehan/Projects/cdk-express-pipeline/dist/js/cdk-express-pipeline@0.0.0.jsii.tgz
scripts.install-cdk-express-pipeline-locally__de: npm run install-cdk-express-pipeline-locally && cdk-express-pipeline deploy '**' --  --profile systanics-role-exported --exclusively --require-approval never --concurrency 10
npm run install-cdk-express-pipeline-locally && cdk-express-pipeline deploy '**'  --debug --  --profile systanics-role-exported --exclusively --require-approval never --concurrency 10
npm run install-cdk-express-pipeline-locally && cdk-express-pipeline deploy 'Wave1_*' --  --profile systanics-role-exported --exclusively --require-approval never --concurrency 10
npm run install-cdk-express-pipeline-locally && cdk-express-pipeline deploy 'Wave2_*' --  --profile systanics-role-exported --exclusively --require-approval never --concurrency 10
scripts.OLD:deploy:Wave2:Local: npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/cdk-express-pipeline.ts deploy 'Wave2_*' --  --profile systanics-role-exported --exclusively --require-approval never --concurrency 10
scripts.OLD:deploy:Wave2:LocalAssembly: npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/cdk-express-pipeline.ts deploy 'Wave2_*' -- --app cdk.out  --profile systanics-role-exported --exclusively --concurrency 10
scripts.install-cdk-express-pipeline-locally__sy: npm run install-cdk-express-pipeline-locally && cdk-express-pipeline synth '**' --  --profile systanics-role-exported --output .test
